name: Ohio Simulator (WIP)
description:
Welcome to Ohio Simulator! Ohio Simulator is a point and click adventure game with hundreds of slides of stupidly funny storylines. Help retrieve a magical stick or teach your friend how to drive, it's your choice in this google slides powered game!

This game is inspired by Kindergarten 1 & 2. If you have not played those games, give them a try. It's worth it.

In order to play, click the download button below. It will not download a file, it will bring you to a website where you can play. If you are wondering why I didn't make it inside of itch.io, it's because it's a google slides game.

If you are not able to view the game, it may be because you are not signed in to your google account. If that doesn't work, oof.
